definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The hotel is in front of the post office.
Mengsk approached the smaller man and stood before him, an intimidating presence.
sentences.chinese: 蒙克斯以威迫的姿態靠近並站在這位小矮人前面。

sentences.english: King Lion's Roar headed their number.
sentences.chinese: 國王獅子吼排在數字的前面。

sentences.english: There’re blue sky，beautiful trees and big buildings ahead.
sentences.chinese: 晴空麗日，前面是婀娜多姿的樹木和高樓大廈。

sentences.english: A new introduction has been prefixed to the third printing of the book.
sentences.chinese: 本書第三次印刷時前面增加了一篇新的序言。

sentences.english: The colorful pocket in the front can change the color as customer require.
sentences.chinese: 前面彩色的裁片可根據客戶的要求更換顏色。

sentences.english: Harris went on top in the last lap .
sentences.chinese: 哈利斯在最後一圈跑到了最前面。

sentences.english: A rose garden fronts the house.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰園位於房子的前面。

sentences.english: Properties and the original Nintendo console in the front.
sentences.chinese: 任天堂原控制器的特點在前面。

sentences.english: The space of front lies among the last home room and the last home way, is a long triangle.
sentences.chinese: 前面的空間介於墓室和墓道之間，是個狹長的三角形。

sentences.english: Some kid left this on the front porch.
sentences.chinese: 一些孩子把這些落在前面的門廊了。

sentences.english: The boulders suddenly disappeared, giving way to a stretch of plain.
sentences.chinese: 突然大石塊不見了，前面是一片平地。

sentences.english: If you cannot win, make the one ahead of you break the record. ----- Jan McKeithen.
sentences.chinese: 如果你贏不了，就幫你前面那個破記錄吧。

sentences.english: A carrier gas filter system is recommended to be installed on the Helium line (He).
sentences.chinese: 在氦氣管路前面建議安裝氣體淨化裝置。

sentences.english: He sits in the front of the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 教室前面有個投幣式電話。

definition: left/the left side/to the left of
